input_parameters.name: title
input_parameters.description: Title of the form shown to the user (24 characters / 8 Japanese characters max)

input_parameters.name: fields
input_parameters.description: A collection of input fields to be shown on the form. See **[Using forms](/automation/forms#element-schema)** for schema.

input_parameters.name: interactivity
input_parameters.description: Context about the interactive event that led to opening of the form. See [form interactivity](/automation/forms) for more.

input_parameters.name: description
input_parameters.description: Description of the form shown to the user
examples: Request access to the underground lair on weekends
Submit your ideas to the think tank

input_parameters.name: submit_label
input_parameters.description: Label of the submit button that the user will click to submit the form

output_parameters.name: fields
output_parameters.description: Values of the input fields filled by the user. See [Using forms](/automation/forms#element-schema) for details.

output_parameters.name: interactivity
output_parameters.description: Context about the form submit action interactive event
